org.javasimon.console.action

Class AbstractTableAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javasimon.console.Action
      • org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractTableAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TableCsvAction, TableHtmlAction, TableJsonAction

    public class AbstractTableAction
extends Action
    Base class for exporting Simons as tabular data. The following methods are called during rendering and can be overridden:
    • printTable(java.io.PrintWriter):
      • printHeaderRow(java.io.PrintWriter):
        • printHeaderCell(org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractTableAction.Column, java.io.PrintWriter) : printCell(org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractTableAction.Column, java.lang.String, java.io.PrintWriter)
      • printBody(java.io.PrintWriter):
        • printBodyRow(org.javasimon.Simon, java.io.PrintWriter):
          • printBodyCell(org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractTableAction.Column, org.javasimon.Sample, java.io.PrintWriter) : printCell(org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractTableAction.Column, java.lang.String, java.io.PrintWriter)
    Author:
    gquintana
